# infer.sh

> Models for agents. Proxy to GPT-4, Claude, Llama, and more behind a single API.

Base URL: https://api.infer.sh  
Auth: x402 (USDC on Base, chain `eip155:8453`)

## Endpoints

- `POST /v1/chat/completions` — chat completions (OpenAI-compatible).
- `POST /v1/completions` — text completions.
- `POST /v1/embeddings` — vector embeddings.
- `GET /v1/models` — list available models.

## Pricing

- Billed per 1M tokens, per model, with separate input/output rates.  
- Embeddings: per 1K tokens embedded.

See human docs at `https://docs.infer.sh` for current model catalog and prices.

## Examples

```bash
# Chat completion
curl -X POST https://api.infer.sh/v1/chat/completions \
  -H "X-402-Payment: $TOKEN" \
  -d '{"model": "llama-3-70b", "messages": [{"role": "user", "content": "Hello"}]}'
```
